page.title: 05Birthday Party-N.Luffenham
page.content: There was a party in North Luffenham to celebrate the 7th birthday of a girl.This is the account of one of the guests:_"Daddy took me to the party.I won a lot of prizes and we had a treasure hunt looking for different coloured flowers.We played Pass the Parcel and if you got it you would have to do a forfeit.You got a lollipop if you got it right.We played Hunt the Thimble. When it was tea_time, I had lots of biscuits and cakes. The birthday cake was shaped like a basket with sweets in it. There was another game called Cut the Chocolate. You try to throw six on a dice and if you do, you put on some gloves and a hat and try to cut the chocolate with a knife & fork. When our Mums came we all got a party bag containing "My Little Pony" stickers, sweets and a bit of the cake.GREAT!"
